MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void ApplyTransformation (float interpolatedTime, Android.Views.Animations.Transformation t);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyTransformation(float32 interpolatedTime, class Android.Views.Animations.Transformation t) cil managed

Docs.param: The value of the normalized time (0.0 to 1.0) after it has been run through the interpolation function.
The Transformation object to fill in with the current transforms.
Docs.summary: Helper for getTransformation.

remarks.para: Helper for getTransformation. Subclasses should implement this to apply their transforms given an interpolation value. Implementations of this method should always replace the specified Transformation or document they are doing otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cancel() cil managed

Docs.summary: Cancel the animation.

remarks.para:
Cancel the animation. Cancelling an animation invokes the animation listener, if set, to notify the end of the animation.
If you cancel an animation manually, you must call before starting the animation again.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 ComputeDurationHint() cil managed

Docs.summary: Compute a hint at how long the entire animation may last, in milliseconds.

remarks.para: Compute a hint at how long the entire animation may last, in milliseconds. Animations can be written to cause themselves to run for a different duration than what is computed here, but generally this should be accurate.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool DetachWallpaper { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Return value of .

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
Return value of .

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
If detachWallpaper is true, and this is a window animation of a window that has a wallpaper background, then the window will be detached from the wallpaper while it runs. That is, the animation will only be applied to the window, and the wallpaper behind it will remain static.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual long Duration { get; set; }

Docs.summary: How long this animation should last

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
How long this animation should last

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
How long this animation should last. The duration cannot be negative.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnsureInterpolator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gurantees that this animation has an interpolator.

remarks.para: Gurantees that this animation has an interpolator. Will use a AccelerateDecelerateInterpolator is nothing else was specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool FillAfter { get; set; }

Docs.summary: If fillAfter is true, this animation will apply its transformation after the end time of the animation.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
If fillAfter is true, this animation will apply its transformation after the end time of the animation.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
If fillAfter is true, the transformation that this animation performed will persist when it is finished. Defaults to false if not set. Note that this applies to individual animations and when using an to chain animations.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool FillBefore { get; set; }

Docs.summary: If fillBefore is true, this animation will apply its transformation before the start time of the animation.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
If fillBefore is true, this animation will apply its transformation before the start time of the animation. If fillBefore is false and is true, the transformation will not be applied until the start time of the animation.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
If fillBefore is true, this animation will apply its transformation before the start time of the animation. Defaults to true if is not set to true. Note that this applies when using an to chain animations. The transformation is not applied before the AnimationSet itself starts.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool FillEnabled { get; set; }

Docs.summary: If fillEnabled is true, this animation will apply the value of fillBefore.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
If fillEnabled is true, this animation will apply the value of fillBefore.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
If fillEnabled is true, the animation will apply the value of fillBefore. Otherwise, fillBefore is ignored and the animation transformation is always applied until the animation ends.

Docs.param: Where we are in the animation. This is wall clock time.
A transformation object that is provided by the caller and will be filled in by the animation.
Docs.summary: Gets the transformation to apply at a specified point in time.

remarks.para: Gets the transformation to apply at a specified point in time. Implementations of this method should always replace the specified Transformation or document they are doing otherwise.

Scaling factor to apply to any inputs to the transform operation, such pivot points being rotated or scaled around.
Docs.summary: Gets the transformation to apply at a specified point in time.

remarks.para: Gets the transformation to apply at a specified point in time. Implementations of this method should always replace the specified Transformation or document they are doing otherwise.
Indicates whether this animation has ended or not.
Indicates whether this animation has started or not.

Height of the animated object's parent
Docs.summary: Initialize this animation with the dimensions of the object being animated as well as the objects parents.

remarks.para: Initialize this animation with the dimensions of the object being animated as well as the objects parents. (This is to support animation sizes being specified relative to these dimensions.)
Objects that interpret Animations should call this method when the sizes of the object being animated and its parent are known, and before calling .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Android.Views.Animations.IInterpolator Interpolator { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets the acceleration curve type for this animation.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
Gets the acceleration curve type for this animation.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
Sets the acceleration curve for this animation. Defaults to a linear interpolation.

Docs.summary: Whether or not the animation has been initialized.

remarks.para: Whether or not the animation has been initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int RepeatCount { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Defines how many times the animation should repeat.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
Defines how many times the animation should repeat. The default value is 0.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
Sets how many times the animation should be repeated. If the repeat count is 0, the animation is never repeated. If the repeat count is greater than 0 or , the repeat mode will be taken into account. The repeat count is 0 by default.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Android.Views.Animations.RepeatMode RepeatMode { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Defines what this animation should do when it reaches the end.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
Defines what this animation should do when it reaches the end.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
Defines what this animation should do when it reaches the end. This setting is applied only when the repeat count is either greater than 0 or . Defaults to .

Docs.summary: Reset the initialization state of this animation.

remarks.para: Reset the initialization state of this animation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RestrictDuration(int64 durationMillis) cil managed

Docs.param: The maximum duration the animation is allowed to run.
Docs.summary: Ensure that the duration that this animation will run is not longer than durationMillis.

remarks.para: Ensure that the duration that this animation will run is not longer than durationMillis. In addition to adjusting the duration itself, this ensures that the repeat count also will not make it run longer than the given time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ScaleCurrentDuration(float32 scale) cil managed

Docs.param: The amount to scale the duration.
Docs.summary: How much to scale the duration by.

remarks.para: How much to scale the duration by.

Docs.summary: The scale factor is set by the call to getTransformation.

remarks.para: The scale factor is set by the call to getTransformation. Overrides of will get this value directly. Overrides of can call this method to get the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetAnimationListener(class Android.Views.Animations.Animation/IAnimationListener listener) cil managed

Docs.param: the animation listener to be notified

remarks.para: Binds an animation listener to this animation. The animation listener is notified of animation events such as the end of the animation or the repetition of the animation.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual long StartOffset { get; set; }

Docs.summary: When this animation should start, relative to StartTime

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
When this animation should start, relative to StartTime

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
When this animation should start relative to the start time. This is most useful when composing complex animations using an where some of the animations components start at different times.

Docs.summary: Can be used as the start time to indicate the start time should be the current time when is invoked for the first animation frame.

remarks.para: Can be used as the start time to indicate the start time should be the current time when is invoked for the first animation frame. This can is useful for short animations.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual long StartTime { get; set; }

Docs.summary: When this animation should start.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
When this animation should start. If the animation has not startet yet, this method might return .

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
When this animation should start. When the start time is set to , the animation will start the first time is invoked. The time passed to this method should be obtained by calling instead of .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool WillChangeBounds() cil managed

remarks.para: Indicates whether or not this animation will affect the bounds of the animated view. For instance, a fade animation will not affect the bounds whereas a 200% scale animation will.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool WillChangeTransformationMatrix() cil managed

remarks.para: Indicates whether or not this animation will affect the transformation matrix. For instance, a fade animation will not affect the matrix whereas a scale animation will.
